install.name: jNews Module
install.author: Joobi Limited
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2012 Joobi Limited All rights reserved

param.name: help
param.label: Help
param.description: Click on the help button to get some help

param.name: linear
param.label: Show module in line
param.description: Select whether or not to show the information in a line or with a vertical presentation.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: Enter the class suffix you would like to use so you can define custom CSS styling.

param.name: cssfile
param.label: Theme
param.description: Select the theme or CSS file for the module

param.name: effect
param.label: Display Effect
param.description: Select the effect you want to add to your module

param.name: listids
param.label: List IDs
param.description: THIS IS A REQUIRED FIELD. Enter the id number of the lists you wish to allow users to subscribe to seperated by a comma , . If only one is entered there will not be an option displayed but they will automatically be subscribed to this list

param.name: showlistname
param.label: Show List Name
param.description: Select whether or not to show the name of the list after the introduction.

param.name: defaultchecked
param.label: Check list by default
param.description: Select whether or not to you want the check box for each list checked by default.

param.name: dropdown
param.label: Display list in dropdown
param.description: Select yes if you want to display your lists in a dropdown

param.name: selecteddrop
param.label: Selected dropdown list
param.description: In case of you dislay your lists in a dropdown, you can specify here the value of the selected list by default

param.name: red_url
param.label: Redirect URL
param.description: The URL that you want the user to be redirected after they have been subscribed, if not specified it will redirect automatically to the user subscription form.

param.name: red_subscription
param.label: Redirect After Subscription
param.description: Redirect page after subscription from the module to jNews page.

param.name: module_message
param.label: Pop-up Subscription Message
param.description: Select Yes to pop-up the subscription message. Select No to put the message in the module.

param.name: introtext
param.label: Introduction text
param.description: The text that appears in the introduction. LEAVE BLANK TO NOT SHOW NOTHING. Use pretext for CSS layout.

param.name: posttext
param.label: Post-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed at the bottom of the subscription form. LEAVE BLANK TO NOT SHOW ANYTHING. Use postext for CSS layout.

param.name: fieldsize
param.label: Field size
param.description: Enter the ammount of characters for the name and e-mail form fields.

param.name: shownamefield
param.label: Show Name Field
param.description: select whether or not to show the name field.

param.name: column1
param.label: Show Column 1 Field
param.description: select whether or not to show column 1 field.

param.name: req_column1
param.label: Require Column 1
param.description: Select whether to set the column 1 field required or not.

param.name: column2
param.label: Show Column 2 Field
param.description: select whether or not to show column 2 field.

param.name: req_column2
param.label: Require Column 2
param.description: Select whether to set the column 2 field required or not.

param.name: column3
param.label: Show Column 3 Field
param.description: select whether or not to show column 3 field.

param.name: req_column3
param.label: Require Column 3
param.description: Select whether to set the column 3 field required or not.

param.name: column4
param.label: Show Column 4 Field
param.description: select whether or not to show column 4 field.

param.name: req_column4
param.label: Require Column 4
param.description: Select whether to set the column 4 field required or not.

param.name: column5
param.label: Show Column 5 Field
param.description: select whether or not to show column 5 field.

param.name: req_column5
param.label: Require Column 5
param.description: Select whether to set the column 5 field required or not.

param.name: receivehtmldefault
param.label: Default Receive HTML
param.description: Set this option to show the default html mailing configuration. If the Show Receive HTML is set to No then this option will be the default.

param.name: showreceivehtml
param.label: Show Receive HTML
param.description: Set to Yes to allow users to decide whether they want HTML or not. Set to No to use default receive html.

param.name: show_terms
param.label: Show Terms and Condition
param.description: Add the Terms and Condition.

param.name: check_terms
param.label: Check Terms and Condition
param.description: Check the terms and condition by default.

param.name: terms_condition
param.label: Terms and Condtion Link
param.description: Enter the complete link for the terms and conditions here.

param.name: enable_captcha
param.label: Use Captcha
param.description: Enable captcha functionality.

param.name: captcha_width
param.label: Captcha Width
param.description: Define the width of the captcha.

param.name: captcha_height
param.label: Captcha Height
param.description: Define the height of the captcha.

param.name: button_text
param.label: Button Unregistered Text
param.description: The text that appears on subcribe button, when people are not subcribed yet, if left blank it will load _JNEWS_MOD_SUBSCRIBE from your language file

param.name: button_img
param.label: Button Unregistered Image
param.description: An image that you want to use for the subcribe button, when people are not subcribed yet, if left blank the button name will be used. If your images is on the site you can specify only the path images/tick.png otherwise specify the full url to your image.

param.name: button_text_change
param.label: Button Registered Text
param.description: The text that appears on subcribe button, when people are logged in, if left blank it will load _JNEWS_CHANGE_SUBSCRIPTIONS from your language file

param.name: button_img_change
param.label: Button Registered Image
param.description: An image that you want to use for the subcribe button, when people are logged in, if left blank the button name will be used. If your images is on the site you can specify only the path images/tick.png otherwise specify the full url to your image.

param.name: mootools_btntext
param.label: Mootools Button Text
param.description: Text displayed on mootools button if the mootools effect is used. If you don't specify, the default value will be used.'

param.name: mootools_boxw
param.label: Mootools Box Width
param.description: The width for the mootools popup/modal box.

param.name: mootools_boxh
param.label: Mootools Box Height
param.description: The height for the mootools popup/modal box.

param.name: use_new
param.label: Use new module layout
param.description: Use new module layout that is in div tags.

param.name: mod_align
param.label: Module alignement
param.description: display alignement of the module. If left blank , it will use default CSS.

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module
